name: Floryd Forest
description:
Welcome to Floryd Forest, are you ready to become the caretaker of your own plot of land, for you to make it a home and protect?

This is a DEMO, so a few things might be preeliminary or not work at all. The formal testing phace will begin later. You, sir, are one of the first people to try out Floryd Forest before I announce it for the world.
